effect.name: Screen Space Reflection (Texture)
effect.description: This shader provides a Screen Space Reflection effect and should be applied to a layer. All objects are reflected, and this shader can also be used as a shadow. It should be used in games/applications that use Direct3D11 or OpenGL ES, as the Direct3D9 version is severely limited and does not function properly like the original.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Screen Space Reflection (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (18.01.2026) */
parameter.description: This shader provides a Screen Space Reflection effect and should be applied to a layer. All objects are reflected, and this shader can also be used as a shadow. It should be used in games/applications that use Direct3D11 or OpenGL ES, as the Direct3D9 version is severely limited and does not function properly like the original.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Reflection Angle
parameter.description: The variable determines the direction of the reflection vector angle. (0 - Left; 90 - Up; 180 - Right; 270 - Down)

parameter.name: Reflection Size
parameter.description: The variable defines the size of the reflection in pixels.

parameter.name: Reflection Jump Pixel
parameter.description: The variable determines the size of the jump pixels at the next reflection line.

parameter.name: Reflection Strength
parameter.description: The variable determines the visibility strength of reflection.

parameter.name: Reflection Alpha Threshold
parameter.description: The variable determines at what alpha color level the reflection should appear.

parameter.name: Reflection Alpha Fade
parameter.description: This variable determines to what power the reflection attenuation should be raised.

parameter.name: Reflection Color
parameter.description: This variable multiplies the colors of the reflection.

parameter.name: Reflection Ignore Color
parameter.description: The variable determines which color is to be ignored (it will not be visible and will not be reflected), with the exception of black, which disables the ignore system.

parameter.name: Offset X
parameter.description: The variable defines the offset of the reflection in the X axis in pixels.

parameter.name: Offset Y
parameter.description: The variable defines the offset of the reflection in the Y axis in pixels.
